overview: Five men are stranded on a desert island after their boat cast away. Firstly, they are apart and they find out the joys of being alone in the world, giving way to their every desire, on the beach as well as in the forest. However, when one of them is captured, the excitement takes a new turn. Plunge into the adventure with Dimitri Leskov, Florian Ladicat, Mathieu Cerceron, Paulo Sanpa, Kams Kamikaz and John Despe.
title: Shipwrecked
